tasks.name: Create Timeline View component
tasks.description: Create timeline view component showing lead progression over time.

instructions.details: Create timeline-view.js component. Display leads chronologically with visual timeline. Add milestones for key events (created, disposition, etc.). Add date range filtering. Make items clickable to view details. Integrate with view controller.

tasks.name: Create Auto-Save Service
tasks.description: Create auto-save service that saves changes automatically after a delay.

instructions.details: Create auto-save-service.js. Implement auto-save after delay (e.g., 2 seconds after last change). Add visual save indicator. Add conflict resolution for concurrent edits. Add undo capability. Integrate with enhanced logger for audit trail.

tasks.name: Create Report Builder component
tasks.description: Create report builder component for custom report creation.

instructions.details: Create report-builder.js component. Add UI for custom report creation: field selection, filter configuration, grouping options, sorting options. Add save/load reports functionality. Generate reports using export service. Integrate with KPI calculator and chart service.

tasks.name: Implement Virtual Scrolling
tasks.description: Implement virtual scrolling for large lists to improve performance.

instructions.details: Implement virtual scrolling in table-view.js and kanban-view.js for large datasets. Only render visible items. Use Intersection Observer API for lazy loading. Optimize for 1000+ items. Test performance with large datasets.
